resources.string: San Mames is a legendary stadium in football history, known as "The Cathedral," with a capacity of 53,000. Opened in 2013, it blends modern design with a rich heritage.
The Guggenheim Museum is an art museum located in Bilbao, Spain. It is the second largest art museum in the world and the largest in Spain.
The Bilbao Exhibition Centre (BEC) is a modern conference and exhibition center located in Barakaldo, Spain, hosting a variety of events and conventions.
Explore the best of Bilbao with our app designed for tourists and culture enthusiasts. Easily navigate between points of interest and choose where you want to go.
